provenance.source: Market data from Yahoo Finance, FRED, Trading Economics

notes.vix: VIX index current value (normal range: 12-20, elevated: 20-30, crisis: 30+)
notes.xbi_vs_spy_30d: XBI relative performance vs SPY over 30 days (percentage points)
notes.fed_rate_change_3m: Fed funds rate change over 3 months (percentage points)
notes.credit_spread_change: High yield credit spread change over 30 days (percentage points)
